Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, dh-sequence-gir <!nogir>, gir1.2-ibus-1.0-dev <!nogir>, gir1.2-gobject-2.0-dev <!nogir>, intltool, libanthy-dev (>= 1:0.3-6), libglib2.0-dev, pkgconf, python3-dev, python3-gi
Description: anthy engine for IBus IBus is an Intelligent Input Bus. It is a new input framework for Linux OS. It provides full featured and user friendly input method user interface. It also may help developers to develop input method easily. . IBus-Anthy is an input method (IM) for Japanese, based on IBus.
Package-List: gir1.2-anthy-9000 deb introspection optional arch=any ibus-anthy deb utils optional arch=all ibus-anthy-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libanthygobject-1.0-5 deb libs optional arch=any
